attributes.action: Protect the Police, protect our Communities
attributes.additional_details:
Sign up to say no to cuts for our Police Service. We need our Police to keep this country safe.
It is quite clear from the awful murders of two Police Officers today in Manchester, that we need our Police on the streets. They deserve every penny they get for the constant danger and daily threat they face. Show your support by signing now and say NO to our government. NO TO CUTS, NO TO REDUCED OFFICER NUMBERS, NO TO PRIVATISATION, NO TO WINSOR CAMERON AND MAY
